name: The Flying Castle of Carmichael the Excellent - LURPS Adventure
name_original: The Flying Castle of Carmichael the Excellent - LURPS Adventure
description:
The Flying Castle of Carmichael the Excellent! A short adventure written for LURPS. 

The wizard, Carmichael the Excellent has accidently fallen off his flying castle, and now it's drifting away. The party will need to mount a rescue mission for it before it's too late!

Get the core rules here free: https://mucker71.itch.io/lurps-core-rules-pdf

Join us on Discord https://discord.gg/5TrD7sD
